title: #100DaysOfCode day 12
body:
## Progress

A few more additions to this website.

* Refreshed my knowledge of the [Open Graph protocol](https://ogp.me/) and implemented essential meta tags with [vue-meta](https://github.com/nuxt/vue-meta)
* Slightly improved performance for supporting browsers by enabling compilation of a [modern build in Nuxt](https://nuxtjs.org/api/configuration-modern/)

## Links

* [Optimize Tweets with Cards](https://developer.twitter.com/en/docs/tweets/optimize-with-cards/guides/getting-started)
* [Twitter Card validator](https://cards-dev.twitter.com/validator)
description: Fun fact: Donna Summer's "Love to Love You Baby" (1975) was the first 12-inch single for public purchase
